title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
description: When switching perspectives in the application, the CVS repository view loses its maximized state. This means that a view that was previously maximized is no longer maximized after switching perspectives.
OB: After switching perspectives, the CVS repository view is no longer maximized.
EB: The CVS repository view should remain maximized even after switching perspectives.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Maximize the CVS repository view.
3. Switch perspectives.
4. Verify that the CVS repository view remains maximized.
